description:
The One Eyed Dude

  is back with:

:.. ripped.: some vids (trailers,intro+Tutorial) ..:

**added ... directx, xlive, openal



:. about .: <a href="
http://www.tothegame.com/pc-5412-the-club-for-pc.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.tothegame.com/pc-5412-the-club-for-pc.html</a>



<+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+>

.: install :.

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: club-start.exe ( must be done! )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and run game with (see desktop). 

**go to the _extras folder and install xlive, directx, and openAl 
    (in case the game does not start!)


<+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+><+>



S p e c i a l   I n f o   N o t e :

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed exe 

( club-start.exe )

as a lame virus, (coz its the byte by byte check error of em!.) 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective 

heuristics, you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual

or VirusTools-WebSite!.(heuristics).    

>>>  thank you for reading!. and remember...
